T02D3706:5b-0: @5b * // gzhal yas khang gsal bar byed pa'i mngon rtogs mun sel sgron ma bzhugs//
T02D3706:5b-2: * // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3706:5b-3: rang bzhin lhun grub 'og min gzhal yas dang //
T02D3706:5b-4: bris pa rdul tshon bskyed pa ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D3706:5b-5: bde gshegs bzhugs gnas gzhal yas gsal byed pa //
T02D3706:5b-6: ting 'dzin mun sel sgron ma bstan par bya //
T02D3706:5b-7: de yang lus don tshul du bstan pa ni //
T02D3706:5b-8: tshad dbyibs rgyu dang rtse mo'i gnas lugs dang //
T02D3706:5b-9: nang dang sgo yi gnas lugs bstan pa dang //
T02D3706:5b-10: rgyan gyi bye brag rnams kyis mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D3706:5b-11: tshad ni 'di zhes nges par bstan du med //
T02D3706:5b-12: blos 'khyud sgom bde gang du gnas pa'o //
T02D3706:5b-13: dbyibs ni pho brang snying po bum pa zlum //
T02D3706:5b-14: gru chad lha rnams rgyas phyir gru bzhi'o //
T02D3706:5b-15: rgyu ni zhi khro gnyis las dang po ni //
T02D3706:5b-16: ye shes rgyu las rin po che ru snang //
T02D3706:5b-17: panytsa re kh'a rdo rje ra ba dang //
T02D3706:5b-18: thog dang ka gdung la sogs de ltar ro //
T02D3706:5b-19: rtse mo bum pa chos nyid gcig tu 'khyil //
T02D3706:5b-20: sna tshogs chos kyi 'khor lo bya 'dab ldan //
T02D3706:5b-21: tog ldan rma bya'i mdongs ltar gnas pa'o //
T02D3706:6a-2: ka bzhi gdung brgyad gru gsum zla gam sogs //
T02D3706:6a-3: rang gzhung gang yin ltar de nyid kyang //
T02D3706:6a-4: lte ba mtho ste 'khor lo padma sogs //
T02D3706:6a-5: rim gyis dma' ste gru chad lhag rnams mnyam //
T02D3706:6a-6: rdo rje ra ba rin chen rkyang sbag gi / bar dang phyi rim rtsig pa dag tu gnas //
T02D3706:6a-7: pha gu bad dang mda' yab bang rim tshul //
T02D3706:6a-8: steng nas bya 'dab seng mgo mu tig ldan //
T02D3706:6a-9: rtsig gseb rin chen ka ba dag gis bteg / de 'og rta babs lha mo la sogs gnas //
T02D3706:6a-10: phyi nang mchod byed yang na bar khyams la'o //
T02D3706:6a-11: sgo la gnyis te khyud can khyud med do //
T02D3706:6a-12: khyud med glo 'bur tshul te sgo ba gcig / khyud can sgo ba gnyis te phyed sgo'o //
T02D3706:6a-13: sgo zur rtsig gseb ka thung bcu drug gi / rgyan gyis rta babs rim pa brgyad ldan 'degs //
T02D3706:6a-14: de gnyis rnam thar brgyad dang ldan phyir ro //
T02D3706:6a-15: mdzes pa'i rta babs them sgas glang chen tshul //
T02D3706:6a-16: mchod rten mgo lnga ltar du 'dod zer ba //
T02D3706:6a-17: 'di yi gzhung min gzhan du rig par bya //
T02D3706:6a-18: mun pa wa ran rin chen chun 'phyang mdzes //
T02D3706:6a-19: bcu gcig rdo rje dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3706:6a-20: rgyan la bdag po phyi nang steng 'og logs //
T02D3706:6a-21: bdag po yab yum la sogs skabs dang sbyar //
T02D3706:6a-22: bla re bzhi gdan dra ba mu tig phreng //
T02D3706:6a-23: gdan la seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
T02D3706:6a-24: nam mkha' lding dang nyi zla padma khri //
T02D3706:6a-25: phyi la rtse mo'i rgyan dang sgo drung ngo //
T02D3706:6a-26: rtse rgyan gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ri dags mdzes //
T02D3706:6a-27: sgo drung rgyan ni rngam glog 'og rim nas //
T02D3706:6a-28: rgyal ba gong ma rnams kyis bshad ltar ro //
T02D3706:6a-29: mtha' ma mu khyud rdo rje me ris bskor //
T02D3706:6a-30: zhi ba'i gzhal yas don ni de ltar gnas //
T02D3706:6a-31: khro bo'i gzhal yas don ni 'di lta ste //
T02D3706:6a-32: tshad dbyibs rtse mo sgo rnams 'dra gcig la //
T02D3706:6a-33: rgyu dang nang dang rgyan gyi bye brag rnams //
T02D3706:6a-34: gong ltar mi gnas bye brag bstan pa ni //
T02D3706:6a-35: rgyu ni dur khrod 'bar ba'i rtsig pa ste //
T02D3706:6a-36: thod pa che phra gnam lcags 'bar bas spras //
T02D3706:6a-37: nang gzhi keng rus rakta'i zil pa chags //
T02D3706:6a-38: zhing dang tshangs pa'i ka gdung rnams dang ldan //
T02D3706:6a-39: chu srin sprul dang nyi zla ka zhu'i rgyan //
T02D3706:6b-0: gza' dang rgyu skar phyam dang gral @6b thabs mdzes //
T02D3706:6b-1: zhing gi spang leb ma tang gnas kyis g-yogs //
T02D3706:6b-2: rgyan ni steng nas zhing chen 'og gdan kyang //
T02D3706:6b-3: nyi zla padma dregs pa sems can no //
T02D3706:6b-4: rtse mo tsitta'i tog la zhing gi gdugs //
T02D3706:6b-5: pha gu thod pa sna tshogs bad du byas //
T02D3706:6b-6: dra ba dra phyed thod sprul dril bu dang //
T02D3706:6b-7: mchod pa'i lha mo phyi nang med par dbul //
T02D3706:6b-8: sgo rgyan rta babs thod pa 'bar ba la //
T02D3706:6b-9: de steng chu srin chos kyi 'khor lor lta //
T02D3706:6b-10: rtse la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gru bzhir mdzes //
T02D3706:6b-11: mtha' ma lcags ri me 'od 'bar ba'i nang //
T02D3706:6b-12: dur khrod chen po brgyad kyis gtams pa ni //
T02D3706:6b-13: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gzhal yas bstan pa'o //
T02D3706:6b-14: de ni bum pa gcig tu 'khyil pa'i gzhung //
T02D3706:6b-15: mchod rten mgo bo ltar du gnas pa ni //
T02D3706:6b-16: dbus kyi pho brang mchod rten bum pa'i tshul //
T02D3706:6b-17: sgo bzhi rta babs mchod rten tshul du gnas //
T02D3706:6b-18: de rnams mtho ste gru chad lha rnams dma' //
T02D3706:6b-19: bcu gcig rdo rje sgo yi byam sgo la //
T02D3706:6b-20: gru chad gdung mgo zla tshes rdo rje'o //
T02D3706:6b-21: rta babs bzhir 'dod gsang sngags phyi yi gzhung //
T02D3706:6b-22: bdag 'dra au dyan padma rgyal po yis //
T02D3706:6b-23: ting 'dzin nyams len dgongs pa mthar phyin kyang //
T02D3706:6b-24: phyi rabs lam pa rnams kyi don ched du //
T02D3706:6b-25: rgyud lung kun dang mi 'gal mun sel ba'i //
T02D3706:6b-26: sgron ma aa mri ta yi don du brtsams //
T02D3706:6b-27: dge bas sems can kun gyis 'phags thob bsngo //
T02D3706:6b-28: gzhal yas khang gsal ba'i mngon rtogs mun sel sgron
